name: Finding the Lamb
description:
The signs are unmistakable: the end is coming.

As the leader of the faith, you must prevent the apocalypse by identifying which of your followers is The Lamb, and offering them as a sacrifice.

Aiding you are three unknowable spirits; two of which will aid you, while one will seek to deceive. Using their clues, you must decide which of your creed will die.

Finding the Lamb was made for the forty-third Ludum Dare Compo.
You can view the source code here.
